title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 2 and Galaxy S21 receive May 2022 update in the U.S.
content:
It’s one thing to buy an Android smartphone, but it’s another to have it supported. Over the past few weeks, Samsung has been updating its Galaxy smartphones at an astonishing rate. So it comes as no surprise at the start of a new week, we get more updates. This time, Samsung has started pushing its May 2022

The post Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 2 and Galaxy S21 receive May 2022 update in the U.S. appeared first on XDA.
description: The May 2022 security update has arrived to unlocked versions of the Samsung Galaxy Fold 2 & Galaxy S21 series in the United States.
